project.title: 혜완이의 밀양 일주일 (Hyewan's Week in Miryang)
project.style: Warm Korean slice-of-life anime, Ghibli-inspired, soft pastel colors

hyewan.name: 혜완 (Hyewan)
hyewan.description: 밝고 호기심 많은 8살 남자아이, 짧은 단발머리에 앞머리, 큰 눈, 귀여운 얼굴, 활발한 성격
hyewan.whisk_prompt: Cute 8-year-old Korean boy, short black hair with neat bangs covering forehead, big round dark eyes, adorable innocent face, wearing gray striped shirt with navy and orange stripes, gentle curious expression, Studio Ghibli anime style, warm colors

grandmother.name: 할머니 (Grandmother)
grandmother.description: 따뜻하고 지적인 55세 할머니, 단정한 단발, 안경, 영어 선생님
grandmother.whisk_prompt: Kind Korean grandmother, 55 years old, neat short permed hair, reading glasses, warm gentle smile, wearing comfortable blouse and long skirt, teacher-like elegant appearance, Ghibli anime style

grandfather.name: 할아버지 (Grandfather)
grandfather.description: 다정한 60세 할아버지, 약간 흰머리, 컴퓨터를 잘 다루심
grandfather.whisk_prompt: Gentle Korean grandfather, 60 years old, slightly gray hair, kind eyes with slight wrinkles, warm smile, wearing casual polo shirt, modern and tech-savvy appearance, Ghibli anime style

mother.name: 엄마 (Mother)
mother.description: 젊고 세련된 30세 엄마, 긴 머리, 따뜻한 미소
mother.whisk_prompt: Young Korean mother, 30 years old, long black hair, modern casual style, loving warm expression, wearing summer dress, caring and elegant, Ghibli anime style

father.name: 아빠 (Father)
father.description: 다정한 30세 아빠, 짧은 머리, 친근한 미소
father.whisk_prompt: Young Korean father, 30 years old, short neat hair, friendly warm smile, wearing casual shirt and pants, dependable and kind appearance, Ghibli anime style

hongsi.name: 홍시 (Hongsi)
hongsi.description: 검은색 진돗개, 옆집에서 놀러오는 친구, 똑똑하고 귀여운 강아지
hongsi.whisk_prompt: Beautiful black Korean Jindo dog, shiny black fur, alert pointed ears, intelligent friendly eyes, loyal and playful expression, healthy muscular build, traditional Korean dog breed, Ghibli anime style, warm friendly atmosphere

story_outline.day_0: 대전에서 밀양으로 기차 여행, 할머니 집 도착
story_outline.day_1: 엄마 아빠 떠남, 할머니와 첫날, 홍시와 첫 만남
story_outline.day_2: 영어 공부, 할아버지와 코딩 첫 수업
story_outline.day_3: 근처 공원 나들이, 홍시와 함께 산책
story_outline.day_4: 할머니 친구 집 방문, 신나게 놀기
story_outline.day_7: 엄마 아빠 오심, 대전으로 귀가, 홍시와 작별

scenes.title: 오프닝 - 대전역
scenes.description: 대전역 앞, 혜완이 가족이 기차를 기다리고 있다

whisk_prompt.subject: hyewan with parents
whisk_prompt.scene: Daejeon train station exterior, modern Korean station, sunny summer morning, family waiting with luggage
whisk_prompt.style: Ghibli anime, warm summer atmosphere

scenes.narration: 여름방학이 시작된 어느 날, 혜완이는 엄마 아빠와 함께 특별한 여행을 떠났어요.

scenes.title: KTX 안에서
scenes.description: 기차 안, 혜완이가 창밖을 신나게 바라본다

whisk_prompt.subject: hyewan looking out train window
whisk_prompt.scene: Inside KTX train, little boy excitedly looking out window at passing countryside, parents smiling beside her, comfortable train seats
whisk_prompt.style: Ghibli anime, travel excitement, motion blur outside window

scenes.narration: 대전에서 밀양까지, 빠른 기차를 타고 가는 길. 창밖으로 논과 산이 빠르게 지나갔어요.

scenes.title: 밀양역 도착
scenes.description: 밀양역에 도착, 할머니 할아버지가 마중 나와 계심

whisk_prompt.subject: grandparents waiting at station
whisk_prompt.scene: Miryang train station, elderly Korean couple waving happily, small town station atmosphere, summer afternoon
whisk_prompt.style: Ghibli anime, heartwarming reunion scene

scenes.narration: 밀양역에 도착하니, 할머니 할아버지가 환하게 웃으며 기다리고 계셨어요.

scenes.title: 반가운 포옹

whisk_prompt.subject: hyewan hugging grandmother
whisk_prompt.scene: Train station platform, little boy running into grandmother's arms, joyful hug, parents and grandfather watching with smiles
whisk_prompt.style: Ghibli anime, emotional reunion, warm colors

scenes.narration: "할머니!" 혜완이는 할머니 품에 폭 안겼어요.

scenes.title: 할머니 집 도착

whisk_prompt.subject: Korean countryside house
whisk_prompt.scene: Cozy Korean house in Miryang, small garden with flowers, traditional but modern mix, warm evening light, family arriving
whisk_prompt.style: Ghibli anime, warm home feeling, golden hour lighting

scenes.narration: 할머니 집은 작은 마당에 예쁜 꽃들이 피어 있는 아늑한 집이었어요.

scenes.title: 저녁 식사

whisk_prompt.subject: family dinner scene
whisk_prompt.scene: Korean family gathered around dinner table, delicious home-cooked meal, grandmother serving food, warm kitchen light, happy conversation
whisk_prompt.style: Ghibli anime, warm family scene, detailed food illustration

scenes.narration: 할머니가 정성껏 차려주신 저녁밥은 정말 맛있었어요. 온 가족이 함께 웃으며 이야기꽃을 피웠어요.

scenes.title: 아침 - 부모님 떠나는 날
scenes.description: 아침, 엄마 아빠가 떠날 준비를 한다

whisk_prompt.subject: parents preparing to leave
whisk_prompt.scene: Early morning, parents with small bags at doorway, grandmother and hyewan seeing them off, slightly sad but understanding atmosphere
whisk_prompt.style: Ghibli anime, morning light, bittersweet mood

scenes.narration: 다음 날 아침, 엄마 아빠는 회사 일 때문에 대전으로 돌아가셔야 했어요.

scenes.title: 작별 인사

whisk_prompt.subject: hyewan waving goodbye to parents
whisk_prompt.scene: Front of house, little boy bravely waving goodbye, parents waving back from car, grandmother holding boy's hand supportively
whisk_prompt.style: Ghibli anime, emotional farewell, morning sunlight

scenes.narration: "다녀오세요! 혜완이 잘 있을게요!" 혜완이는 씩씩하게 손을 흔들었어요.

scenes.title: 홍시 등장!

whisk_prompt.subject: black jindo dog hongsi
whisk_prompt.scene: Front yard, beautiful black Jindo dog trotting over from next door, tail wagging, curious and friendly, boy noticing with surprise
whisk_prompt.style: Ghibli anime, cute dog introduction, sunny morning

scenes.narration: 그때, 옆집에서 검은 진돗개 한 마리가 꼬리를 흔들며 뛰어왔어요. "어머, 홍시가 왔네!"

scenes.title: 홍시와 첫 만남

whisk_prompt.subject: hyewan meeting hongsi
whisk_prompt.scene: Girl kneeling to pet black Jindo dog, dog sniffing her hand friendly, grandmother watching with smile, garden setting
whisk_prompt.style: Ghibli anime, first meeting, friendship beginning

scenes.narration: "안녕, 홍시! 나는 혜완이야." 홍시는 혜완이 손 냄새를 맡더니 꼬리를 더 세게 흔들었어요.

scenes.title: 홍시와 놀기

whisk_prompt.subject: playing with hongsi in yard
whisk_prompt.scene: Girl running in garden with black Jindo dog chasing her playfully, joyful play, grandmother watching from porch
whisk_prompt.style: Ghibli anime, playful energy, summer fun

scenes.narration: 혜완이와 홍시는 마당에서 신나게 뛰어놀았어요. 금방 단짝 친구가 되었어요.

scenes.title: 아침 영어 공부

whisk_prompt.subject: grandmother teaching english
whisk_prompt.scene: Living room with books, grandmother with reading glasses teaching English to granddaughter, ABC books, educational warm atmosphere
whisk_prompt.style: Ghibli anime, learning scene, warm indoor lighting

scenes.narration: 할머니는 영어 선생님이셨어요. 아침마다 재미있게 영어를 가르쳐주셨어요.

scenes.title: 영어 노래 부르기

whisk_prompt.subject: singing english songs together
whisk_prompt.scene: Grandmother and boy singing together, musical notes floating, happy expressions, fun learning atmosphere
whisk_prompt.style: Ghibli anime, musical joy, playful scene

scenes.narration: "ABC~ 노래 따라해 볼까?" 영어 공부는 노래로 해서 하나도 지루하지 않았어요.

scenes.title: 할아버지 퇴근

whisk_prompt.subject: grandfather coming home from work
whisk_prompt.scene: Evening, grandfather arriving home, boy and black Jindo dog running to greet him at door, happy reunion, warm sunset light
whisk_prompt.style: Ghibli anime, homecoming scene, golden hour

scenes.narration: 저녁이 되면 할아버지가 회사에서 돌아오셨어요. 혜완이와 홍시는 현관에서 뛰어나가 맞이했어요.

scenes.title: 코딩 첫 수업

whisk_prompt.subject: grandfather teaching coding
whisk_prompt.scene: Study room with computer, grandfather and granddaughter at desk, colorful code on screen, black dog lying nearby, learning programming together
whisk_prompt.style: Ghibli anime, modern technology meets warm family, screen glow

scenes.narration: 할아버지는 컴퓨터를 아주 잘 다루셨어요. "혜완아, 오늘은 코딩이 뭔지 배워볼까?"

scenes.title: 첫 코드 성공

whisk_prompt.subject: hyewan excited at computer
whisk_prompt.scene: Girl's eyes sparkling looking at screen, simple program running successfully, grandfather smiling proudly, achievement moment
whisk_prompt.style: Ghibli anime, success moment, joyful discovery

scenes.narration: "와! 내가 만든 게 움직여요!" 화면에 혜완이가 만든 캐릭터가 움직이자 깜짝 놀랐어요.

scenes.title: 공원 가는 길 - 홍시와 함께
scenes.description: 할머니, 홍시와 함께 동네 공원으로 가는 길

whisk_prompt.subject: walking to park with grandmother and dog
whisk_prompt.scene: Korean neighborhood street, grandmother and boy walking with black Jindo dog on leash, sunny day, trees lining the street
whisk_prompt.style: Ghibli anime, peaceful walk, summer atmosphere

scenes.narration: 다음 날, 할머니와 홍시와 함께 동네 공원으로 산책을 나갔어요.

scenes.title: 공원 놀이터

whisk_prompt.subject: hyewan playing at playground
whisk_prompt.scene: Korean park playground, boy on swing, grandmother watching from bench with black dog sitting beside her, bright sunny day
whisk_prompt.style: Ghibli anime, childhood joy, dynamic movement

scenes.narration: 놀이터에서 그네도 타고, 미끄럼틀도 타며 신나게 놀았어요. 홍시는 할머니 옆에서 얌전히 기다렸어요.

scenes.title: 홍시와 공놀이

whisk_prompt.subject: playing fetch with hongsi
whisk_prompt.scene: Park grass field, boy throwing ball for black Jindo dog, dog running to catch it, joyful playtime, summer sunshine
whisk_prompt.style: Ghibli anime, dog and child play, energetic scene

scenes.narration: 넓은 잔디밭에서 홍시와 공놀이도 했어요. 홍시는 공을 정말 잘 물어왔어요!

scenes.title: 벤치에서 아이스크림

whisk_prompt.subject: eating ice cream on bench
whisk_prompt.scene: Park bench under tree shade, grandmother and boy eating ice cream cones, black dog resting at their feet, summer breeze
whisk_prompt.style: Ghibli anime, sweet moment, dappled sunlight

scenes.narration: 놀다가 지치면 할머니와 함께 아이스크림을 먹으며 쉬었어요.

scenes.title: 할머니 친구 집 가는 길
scenes.description: 할머니와 함께 할머니 친구 집으로 간다

whisk_prompt.subject: visiting grandmother's friend
whisk_prompt.scene: Walking through Miryang neighborhood, grandmother and boy dressed nicely, carrying small gift, residential area
whisk_prompt.style: Ghibli anime, outing adventure, anticipation

scenes.narration: 어느 날은 할머니 친구 분 댁에 놀러 갔어요.

scenes.title: 친구 할머니 집

whisk_prompt.subject: meeting grandmother's friend
whisk_prompt.scene: Doorway of traditional Korean house, friendly elderly woman greeting them warmly, welcoming atmosphere, cat visible inside
whisk_prompt.style: Ghibli anime, warm hospitality, traditional home

scenes.narration: "어머, 이게 혜완이구나! 얼마나 예쁘니!" 할머니 친구 분이 반갑게 맞아주셨어요.

scenes.title: 맛있는 간식

whisk_prompt.subject: enjoying korean snacks
whisk_prompt.scene: Traditional living room, table with Korean sweets and fruits, boy eating happily, grandmothers chatting, cozy atmosphere
whisk_prompt.style: Ghibli anime, Korean hospitality, delicious food

scenes.narration: 맛있는 한과도 먹고, 수박도 먹으며 재미있는 이야기를 들었어요.

scenes.title: 고양이와 놀기

whisk_prompt.subject: hyewan playing with cat
whisk_prompt.scene: Living room floor, boy playing with fluffy cat, cat toy in hand, joyful interaction, afternoon sunlight
whisk_prompt.style: Ghibli anime, cute animal moment, playful scene

scenes.narration: 그 집에는 귀여운 고양이가 있었어요. 혜완이와 고양이는 금방 친구가 되었어요.

scenes.title: 게임 만들기 시작

whisk_prompt.subject: game development session
whisk_prompt.scene: Computer desk, grandfather and boy discussing game ideas, sketch paper with game characters, black dog watching curiously
whisk_prompt.style: Ghibli anime, creative process, brainstorming

scenes.narration: 이번엔 할아버지와 함께 진짜 게임을 만들어보기로 했어요.

scenes.title: 캐릭터 그리기

whisk_prompt.subject: hyewan drawing game character
whisk_prompt.scene: Girl concentrating on drawing cute dog character on paper, colored pencils around, creative expression, drawing looks like Hongsi
whisk_prompt.style: Ghibli anime, artistic creation, child's creativity

scenes.narration: "내가 캐릭터를 그릴게요!" 혜완이는 홍시를 닮은 귀여운 강아지 캐릭터를 그렸어요.

scenes.title: 게임 완성!

whisk_prompt.subject: playing completed game
whisk_prompt.scene: Computer screen showing simple game with black dog character jumping, boy and grandfather playing together excitedly, real dog watching screen
whisk_prompt.style: Ghibli anime, achievement, family gaming

scenes.narration: 드디어 게임이 완성됐어요! 혜완이가 그린 홍시가 화면에서 점프하고 있었어요.

scenes.title: 홍시도 구경
scenes.description: 홍시가 화면 속 자기를 보고 고개를 갸웃거린다

whisk_prompt.subject: hongsi looking at game screen
whisk_prompt.scene: Black Jindo dog tilting head curiously at computer screen showing cartoon dog, funny moment, family laughing
whisk_prompt.style: Ghibli anime, cute dog reaction, humorous scene

scenes.narration: 홍시도 화면 속 자기를 보더니 고개를 갸우뚱했어요. 모두 웃음이 터졌어요.

scenes.title: 마지막 밤
scenes.description: 마지막 밤, 온 가족이 함께 밤하늘을 본다

whisk_prompt.subject: family stargazing with dog
whisk_prompt.scene: House yard at night, grandparents and boy looking at starry sky, black dog sitting beside them, pointing at stars, peaceful night
whisk_prompt.style: Ghibli anime, magical night, starry sky

scenes.narration: 마지막 밤, 할머니 할아버지와 홍시와 함께 마당에서 별을 봤어요.

scenes.title: 할머니 무릎 베개
scenes.description: 혜완이가 할머니 무릎에 누워 이야기를 듣는다

whisk_prompt.subject: resting on grandmother's lap
whisk_prompt.scene: Living room at night, boy lying on grandmother's lap, grandmother stroking her hair gently, black dog sleeping nearby, warm lamp light
whisk_prompt.style: Ghibli anime, tender moment, cozy atmosphere

scenes.narration: 할머니 무릎에 누워 이야기를 들으니 스르르 잠이 왔어요. 홍시도 옆에서 잠들었어요.

scenes.title: 마지막 아침
scenes.description: 마지막 날 아침, 혜완이가 짐을 싼다

whisk_prompt.subject: packing bags last morning
whisk_prompt.scene: Guest room, boy packing small bag, slightly sad expression, black dog watching from doorway, morning light
whisk_prompt.style: Ghibli anime, bittersweet morning, last day

scenes.narration: 벌써 일주일이 지났어요. 엄마 아빠가 데리러 오시는 날이에요.

scenes.title: 부모님 도착

whisk_prompt.subject: parents arriving
whisk_prompt.scene: Front of house, car arriving, parents getting out waving, boy running out with dog beside her, excited reunion moment
whisk_prompt.style: Ghibli anime, joyful arrival, family reunion

scenes.narration: 엄마 아빠가 도착하셨어요! 혜완이는 뛰어나가 안겼어요.

scenes.title: 엄마에게 달려가기

whisk_prompt.subject: hyewan running to mother
whisk_prompt.scene: Girl running with open arms to mother, emotional embrace, father watching with smile, grandparents and dog in background
whisk_prompt.style: Ghibli anime, emotional reunion, slow motion feel

scenes.narration: "엄마! 아빠! 보고 싶었어요!" 혜완이가 엄마 품에 안겼어요.

scenes.title: 홍시와 작별

whisk_prompt.subject: saying goodbye to hongsi
whisk_prompt.scene: Girl kneeling hugging black Jindo dog tightly, dog licking her face, emotional goodbye between friends, family watching
whisk_prompt.style: Ghibli anime, emotional farewell, friendship

scenes.narration: "홍시야, 다음에 또 올게. 기다려!" 홍시가 혜완이 얼굴을 핥아주었어요.

scenes.title: 할머니 할아버지께 인사

whisk_prompt.subject: saying goodbye to grandparents
whisk_prompt.scene: Doorway, boy hugging grandmother tightly, grandfather patting her head, tearful but happy goodbye, dog sitting nearby
whisk_prompt.style: Ghibli anime, emotional farewell, love

scenes.narration: "할머니, 할아버지, 정말 재미있었어요. 또 올게요!"

scenes.title: 떠나는 차 안에서

whisk_prompt.subject: waving from car window
whisk_prompt.scene: Girl in back seat of car waving through window, grandparents and black dog waving back from house, car pulling away
whisk_prompt.style: Ghibli anime, bittersweet departure, hand waving

scenes.narration: 차가 출발하고, 혜완이는 할머니 할아버지와 홍시가 보이지 않을 때까지 손을 흔들었어요.

scenes.title: 차 안에서 회상 (몽타주)

whisk_prompt.subject: happy memories montage
whisk_prompt.scene: Split screen collage: English lesson, coding, park with dog, cat, game, stargazing, playing with Hongsi, dreamy filter
whisk_prompt.style: Ghibli anime, memory montage, soft glowing edges

scenes.narration: 영어 공부, 코딩, 공원, 고양이, 게임 만들기, 그리고 홍시... 모든 순간이 소중한 추억이 되었어요.

scenes.title: 엔딩 - 할머니 집과 홍시
scenes.description: 해질녘 밀양 할머니 집, 홍시가 마당에서 기다린다

whisk_prompt.subject: grandmother's house with hongsi at sunset
whisk_prompt.scene: Miryang house at golden hour, black Jindo dog sitting in front yard looking at road, waiting for friend to return, warm lights from windows, grandparents on porch
whisk_prompt.style: Ghibli anime, warm ending, nostalgic atmosphere, credits scene

scenes.narration: 밀양 할머니 집에서는 홍시가 혜완이를 기다리고 있었어요. 다음 방학에 또 만나요! 끝.

bgm_suggestions: Opening/Travel: Light cheerful acoustic guitar, adventure feeling
Daily life: Warm piano, cozy atmosphere
